title: Didn't get the haunted minion icon.
body:
Hello,
I've summoned and even beaten super devil teemo at the halloween event, and didn't get the haunted minion icon. I got the little devil teemo icon though. But basically i cant get the teemo icon without getting the haunted minion icon right?

replies.body: Den haunted minion hast du bekommen wenn du 500 minions in den kessel geworfen hast in dem browserspiel.
i wonder you're asking for it so late
